Text: FW Eratings Cc email attached below is describes the individuals in RAC who will take on country risk analysis responsibilities within RAC with the intent of reviewing countries on a more frequent basis and recommending changes to Eratings should conditions warrant The list of countries upon which more frequent analysis is required is below We have offered to help with the more frequent review Gwyn RAC Priority List of Countries Eratings Reviews Argentina Bolivia Brazil Canada China Colombia Dom Republic England Germany Guam Guatemala Hungary India Indonesia Italy Jamaica Japan Mexico Nicaragua Palestine Panama Philippines Poland Puerto Rico S Korea Sweden Switzerland Turkey UAE United Arab Emirates Venezuela Original Message From Koskas Ethel Sent Wednesday May PM To Gorte David Cangucu Andre Ibarra Felipe Reyes Pauline Kose Ahmet Lee KyuBong Subject Eratings Dear All In order to Erate the countries where Enron has assets and trading activity by Friday we have divided the work in order to meet the deadline Felipe Ibarra will offer his expertise on the following countries Colombia Dom Republic India Jamaica Mexico Nicaragua Panama Ahmet Kose will put his credit on the following Turkey Hungary UAE Pauline Reyes Philippines Kyu Bong Lee SKorea Ethel Koskas will do the rest of the countries We need the rating for each of these countries by THIS FRIDAY afternoon With a short paragraph explaining why the rating should be changed if need be and justification of the new rating Document will be sent to Dave Gorte Maureen Raymond Castaneda Research Olivier Herbelot Rac Underwriting Europe on friday evening They will have days to review it and then discuss with Rick Buy on thursday prior to posting the new Erating template on the RAC WEBSITE In parallel we are trying to implement an Erating by country search possible on the Rac website Thank you so much in advance All the best Felipe and Ethel
